findings.title: L01 - Public Function could be Declared External
findings.description: Public functions that are never called by the contract should be declared external to save gas.

findings.title: L04 - Conformance to Solidity Naming Conventions
findings.description: Solidity defines a naming convention that should be followed.

findings.title: L05 - Unused State Variable
findings.description: There are segments that contain unused state variables.

findings.title: L06 - Missing Events Access Control
findings.description: Detected missing events for critical access control parameters. There are functions that have no event emitted, so it is difficult to track off-chain changes.

findings.title: L14 - Uninitialized Variables in Local Scope
findings.description: There are variables that are defined in the local scope and are not initialized.

findings.title: MT - Mint Tokens
findings.description: The contract owner has the authority to mint tokens, which may result in highly inflated contract tokens.
